input_text:
Job Title: Entry Level Marketing

Location: Greater Orlando

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Business Development, Management

Description:
Location: Orlando, FLJob Type: Full-time, Part-time
About Us:UB Team is not just a workplace; it's a space for personal and professional growth. We are a dynamic marketing agency that thrives on creativity and innovation. Our commitment to nurturing talent and providing opportunities for personal development sets us apart. As we continue to expand, we are excited to welcome a motivated individual to join us as an Entry-Level Marketing Specialist with a focus on events.
Job Description:As an Entry-Level Direct Marketing Specialist - Events at UB Team, you won't just be executing campaigns; you'll be on a journey of personal and professional development. We believe in investing in our team members and providing a platform for growth. This role is tailored for someone who is not only eager to learn but is also looking to carve out a rewarding career path in the dynamic world of direct marketing.
Responsibilities:● Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement event-focused direct marketing strategies.● Actively participate in the planning and coordination of events, gaining hands-on experience in every aspect of event management.● Execute targeted direct marketing campaigns, learning the intricacies of reaching and engaging diverse audiences.● Analyze campaign performance and receive mentorship to enhance your analytical and strategic skills.● Build and nurture relationships with clients, vendors, and event partners, fostering networking and relationship-building skills.Qualifications:
● Strong communication and interpersonal skills.● Detail-oriented with excellent organizational abilities.● Eagerness to learn and a passion for personal and professional development.● Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.Benefits:
● Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses.● Health, dental, and vision insurance.● Ongoing training and development programs tailored to your career goals.● Opportunities for advancement within the company.● Mentorship programs to guide your career growth.● Fun and inclusive work environment that values diversity.● Opportunity to travel in and out of state
How to Apply:Ready to embark on a journey of growth? We're eager to hear from you! Submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your aspirations and how you envision your personal and professional development with UB Team to EMAIL?
UB team is an equal opportunity employer. We are dedicated to fostering an inclusive environment that supports the growth and success of all team members. Join us on this exciting adventure!
WEBSITE: www.teamub.solutions

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Entry Level Marketing
output_json.summary: Join a dynamic marketing agency as an Entry-Level Marketing Specialist focusing on events.
optional_skills: Passion for personal and professional development
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
job_responsibilities: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement event-focused direct marketing strategies.
Actively participate in the planning and coordination of events.
Build and nurture relationships with clients, vendors, and event partners.
output_json.travel_requirements: Travel in and out of state
output_json.company_information: Dynamic marketing agency focused on creativity and innovation, offering personal and professional growth opportunities.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Equal opportunity employer dedicated to fostering an inclusive environment.

other.content: Submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your aspirations and how you envision your personal and professional development with UB Team to EMAIL?
